subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: I'm gonna choke you out
body:
This Week on CBS SportsLine - a weekly programming guide





 






 



July 2 - July 8, 2007






 
 
 
 







 



This programming guide is updated throughout the week. Click here to see the latest version






 


 


 



I'm gonna choke you out
I'm gonna choke you out Would you let this guy choke you out? (Provided to SportsLine)

Gregg Doyel really wanted to lose consciousness. Not finding any 
      readers handy, he sought out Jorge Gurgel, in training for this 
      weekend's 'UFC 73: Stacked.' What's it like to get choked out? Find out 
      Tuesday ... but here's a sneak peek. Doyel 
      | Choke 
      him ... harder!
 






 

 





 This week: Who will endure to win Wimbledon?

Serena Williams (pictured) gets a helping hand from the rain 
      Monday as her match is delayed just after an injury. She survives to 
      play another day. Follow the quests for championships on SportsLine.
    

  
• Scores | Notes | Photos | Brackets: Women | Men  

 




U P C O M I N G  V I D E O



Daily

 
Sports Update
What's happening in sports? Jason Horowitz and Amber Wilson have the lowdown on the showdowns.







TuesdayJuly 3

 
Fantasy Football Show
Keep up with your fellow owners in the offseason with Dave Richard and Jamey Eisenberg, every week. 








WednesdayJuly 4

 
Auto Racing
Pete Pistone previews this week's race at Daytona.







ThursdayJuly 5

 
Fantasy Baseball
Amber Wilson and David Gonos help you plan your lineup for the upcoming week.
Baseball
Senior writer Scott Miller chats with Amber Wilson about his latest Hot Topic in MLB.
Gregg Doyel's Hate Mail
National Columnist brings his schtick to the small screen. 








Complete video schedule for the week 





 


 





U P C O M I N G  S C H E D U L E



MondayJuly 2

 
College Basketball
What's June like for new UK coach Billy Gillispie? Gary Parrish found out.








TuesdayJuly 3

 
Baseball
Eric Mack's Power Rankings ... and his top Fantasy Power Players.
Speaking of Fantasy:
David Gonos highlights the top first-half performers.








WednesdayJuly 4

 
Happy Independence!








ThursdayJuly 5

 
Golf
Steve Elling's in D.C. for the inaugural Tiger tourney. 
Baseball
Scott Miller unveils his annual Anti All-Star Team.







FridayJuly 6

 
Fantasy Baseball
Eric Mack's prospects report.
Auto Racing
Qualifying for Daytona, plus Pete Pistone's preview of the 400.









SaturdayJuly 7

 
Fantasy Baseball
David Gonos' Hitting Planner for Week 15.








SundayJuly 8

 
Auto Racing
Nextel Cup returns to Daytona for the midseason 400.
Fantasy Baseball
Get your lineup set early -- don't miss Eric Mack's Pitching Planner.





 




K E Y   D A T E S



July 19

 
Golf
Tiger Woods begins defense of his British Open title at Carnoustie.







July 29

 
Auto Racing
NASCAR goes to Indianapolis for 400 miles at the Brickyard.







Aug. 5

 
NFL
Pro Football Hall of Fame Game, New Orleans vs. Pittsburgh.
